An_approachable_performant_and_versatile: A different service for a different client
Add_components_without_sending_additiona: We operate on routes covering 5 continents, ensuring your goods reach their destination on time.
Automatic_Image_Font_and_Script_Optimiza: From import and export to specialized services such as multimodal transport, cargo consolidation (FCL and LCL), and hazardous cargo handling (IMO).
A_rich_incredibly_adoptable_template_tha: We implement real-time monitoring and control systems to provide updated information on the status of your cargo.
This_is_a_simple_about_page_just_to_show: This is a simple about page to show how you can use internationalization on different pages.

about.title: About Us
about.intro: We are a leading logistics operator with over 20 years of experience in transportation, customs, and international freight services. Our commitment is to offer comprehensive solutions tailored to our clients' needs.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide our clients with comprehensive and competitive logistics solutions, based on a synchronized service at both national and international levels.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be recognized as the best comprehensive Logistics Operator at both national and international levels.

alliances.title: Strategic Alliances
alliances.description: We have the support of financial entities such as BCP, BBVA, and Scotiabank.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Since our beginnings, we have worked to provide innovative and personalized logistics solutions. Our experience has allowed us to become a reliable strategic partner for companies of all sizes.

globalNetwork.title: Our Global Network
globalNetwork.description: With presence in 5 continents and more than 94 countries, our international network guarantees the logistics coverage your business needs to grow in a globalized market.

cta.title: Ready to optimize your logistics?
cta.description: Discover how our solutions can make a difference in your business.

header.title: Integrated Solutions
header.subtitle: Find the most suitable logistics solutions for your company.

customs.title: Customs Brokerage
customs.description: We facilitate all customs procedures, complying with current regulations and legal requirements.

freight.title: International Freight
freight.description: We offer international freight transportation backed by strategic alliances that ensure efficient shipment management.

consulting.title: Trade Consulting
consulting.description: We provide specialized support in regulations and customs processes, keeping you updated on changes in laws.

transport.title: Cargo Transport
transport.description: We provide transportation for light and heavy cargo with GPS tracking and high-quality standards in international logistics.

packaging.title: Packaging to All Destinations
packaging.description: We ensure professional packaging for Peruvian products destined for any part of the world.

logistic.dispatchTime: The average dispatch time starts once we receive complete documents and information.

cargo.serviceTime: The average service time across all jurisdictions is 48 hours.

note.validity: Valid in all jurisdictions where we operate, depending on the type of merchandise.
note.negotiable: All rates are negotiable based on values, volume or quantity, and the complexity of operations.

special.title: Special and/or Temporary Regimes
special.detail4: Subject to revision based on complexity.

fcl.title: FCL Cargo
fcl.detail4: Other charges as per shipping line

land.title: Land Transport and Project Cargo
land.detail1: Rates subject to revision based on route and operation requirements.
land.detail3: Freight rates are determined based on route, cargo type, volume, dimensions, and weight.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are here to help you. Please fill out the form.

form.mensajePlaceholder: Leave your inquiry or comment here...

errors.nombreLetras: The name should only contain letters and spaces.
errors.telefonoEspacios: Spaces are not allowed in the phone number.
errors.telefonoNumerico: The phone number must be numeric.
errors.corregirErrores: Please correct the errors before sending.
errors.servidorError: An error occurred while sending the form.

Visit_Us_Description: Visit us at our corporate office, conveniently located.
Opening_Hours_Details: Mon to Fri 8:30 am to 6:15 pm, Sat 8:40 am to 12:00 pm
